ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The Fig. 1 and the Fig. 2 were reprinted from “Ozawa, T., Revesz, T., Paviour, D., Lees, A., Quinn, N., Tada, M., Kakita, A., Onodera, O., Wakabayashi, K., Takahashi, H., Nishizawa, M. and Holton, J. (2012) Difference in MSA phenotype distribution between populations: genetics or environment? J. Parkinsons Dis. 2, 7–18.” with permission from IOS Press. The publication is available at IOS Press through http://dx.doi.org/10.3233/JPD-2012-11056.
